'''Thomas "ProfMobius" Guimbretière'''<ref>{{tweet|ProfMobius|647129744035680256|@KnightMiner My first name is Thomas. I might have inverted it on JIRA, but the wiki page shows the proper order (not the Mojang_AB page).|September 24, 2015}}</ref> is a former game developer working at [[Mojang Studios]]. He worked on ''[[Minecraft]]'' and is well known for co-founding the [[Programs and editors/Mod Coder Pack|Mod Coder Pack]] alongside [[Michael Stoyke]]. He has also made many mods for ''Minecraft'', with two of his most notable mods being [[ftb:WAILA|Waila]] and [[ftb:JABBA|Jabba]].<ref>http://minecraft.curseforge.com/members/ProfMobius/projects</ref><ref>[[ftb:ProfMobius]]</ref>

== Biography ==

[[Mariana Graham]] announced her engagement to Thomas on August 10, 2016,<ref>{{tweet|RazzleberryFox|763410142113169408|I... said ... YES! *squeal* @ProfMobius <3 @RazzleberryFox|August 10, 2016}}</ref> and they were married on September 10, 2016.<ref>{{tweet|searge|774653172057006081|Congratulations Mr. and Mrs. Moebius @ProfMobius @RazzleberryFox live long and prosper and may the force be with you|September 10, 2016}}</ref>

Thomas Guimbretière announced he had left Mojang on 9th June 2020 to "explore new horizons",<ref>{{tweet|ProfMobius|1270309524113625088|After working on minecraft for nearly 10 years, first as MCP cofounder, then as a modder and finally as an official developer for Mojang, circumstances led me to move on and explore new horizons.|9 June 2020}}</ref> and is now working with Mariana Graham for Razzleberries AB.<ref>{{tweet|ProfMobius|1270309595051892742|I am now working with the lovely @RazzleberryFox for @RazzleberriesAB and will be helping making content for... Minecraft? I guess this whole exploring new horizons didn't really work out after all  :D|9 June 2020}}</ref>
